data.actual_result: Switching to Friends tab preserves the "opened" state of the emoji picker, so when you switch to a different server you see the emoji picker open unexpectedly
data.short_description: Switching to Friends tab and going back to server preserves emoji picker open
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to Friends tab - Switch to a server and open emoji picker - Go back to Friends tab and eventually do stuff (accept friend requests, unblock people, etc) - Go back to the server (or a different one, doesn't matter)
